title: Great Company
pros: - Integrity - do the right thing - no shenanigans or questionable practices - Profitability - very strong investment model - smart and long term strategy - Investment Strategy - investment leaders understand the economy and how to effectively invest in all markets - Small company mentality with large company results - Beautiful, comfortable work environment - Fair and generous compensation and benefits - Recognition for achievements
cons: I'll never find a better place to work.

title: Worklife at MFA
pros: Good benefits Competitive salaries Flexible hours
cons: Internal politics Authoritative and impediments in growth
